# Government Tender Announcement
**Project Title:** AMENDMENT TO 6D063-235154

## Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4447171806-Doc4489022096
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4447171806
* **Original Publication Date:** March 14, 2024
* **Tender Closes:** April 15, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

## Important Update

Please note that the Ariba Discovery posting and CanadaBuys posting closing times have been disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by **April 18, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT**. Any submissions made after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.

## Project Description

The Public Health Agency of Canada is seeking a Droplet Digital PCR System, including supply, delivery, and installation.

## Contract Details

* **GPIN:** None
* **GSA Contract Line:** None
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, etc.

## Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User Information

* **End User Entity:** Public Health Agency of Canada
* **Address:** 130 Colonnade Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contractor Contact:** Oana Lee
* **Contact Email:** [oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19094705?extsite=MTkwOTQ3MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
